column4: Microsoft flags dangers to EU of plans to limit data use
column5: ATHENS Microsoft said on Wednesday that EU lawmakers' copyright reforms limiting the use of potentially valuable data to non-profit bodies could damage the European Union's digital development.

column4: Microsoft flags dangers to EU of plans to limit data use
column5: ATHENS  Sept 5 Microsoft said on Wednesday that EU lawmakers' copyright reforms limiting the use of potentially valuable data to non-profit bodies could damage the European Union's digital development.
